room_title: Escape room "Curse of the Bambino" by Cooperstown Escape Rooms in Cooperstown
review: What a great place. Our whole family cracked the Curse of the Bambino. So much fun. You will want to go back and escape every room!

room_title: Escape room "Curse of the Bambino" by Cooperstown Escape Rooms in Cooperstown
review: We took two high school baseball teams here on short notice and Montel was beyond accommodating for our large group. Great experience for our guys!

room_title: Escape room "Curse of the Bambino" by Cooperstown Escape Rooms in Cooperstown
review: So much fun! Definitely recommend the Curse of the Bambino to anyone staying in the area. Jonny was super responsive and flexible.

room_title: Escape room "Curse of the Bambino" by Cooperstown Escape Rooms in Cooperstown
review: Had a great time and managed to solve the curse of the Bambino. It was a challenge but we did it! Definitely recommend!
